                adminifier
            
            
                
                    
                        Usage

            adminifier
        
        
            --
        
import "."

        
            Package adminifier provides an administrative panel with a web-based editor.
        
        
            
                Usage
            
            
                
                    
                        func  Configure
                    
func Configure()

                    
                        Configure sets up adminifier on webserver.ServeMux using webserver.Conf.
